content.html: Here's an example: I think Magdalen Berns was a transphobic hatemonger. @jk_rowling thinks Magdalen Berns was "a great believer in the reality of biological sex." Is it oppressive of me to say that is it terrible to promote a transphobic hatemonger to 14 million people??
content.value:
Here's an example:

I think Magdalen Berns was a transphobic hatemonger.

@jk_rowling thinks Magdalen Berns was "a great believer in the reality of biological sex."

Is it oppressive of me to say that is it terrible to promote a transphobic hatemonger to 14 million people??
